text: Trying to format a property in an email as currency, `{{ company.balance | format_currency("en-US") }}`  and i am simply getting the raw value output in the email. is there anything specific i need to do?

I don't think filters work in email, as I've run into the same block with using the `datetimeformat` filter. At the top of <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters> there's the note: "Please note that using filters on any personalization variables (such as but not limited to contacts, company, and deal variables) is not currently supported for email in HubSpot due to how emails are rendered. Filters can be applied to these properties on HubSpot CMS page and blog templates."
It does also do this if I choose 7 straight away. 5 seems to be the magic number!

Hey Guys,
I need little help. I'm trying to submit my Email Template on the marketplace. I'm getting an attached error. can anyone help me to fix this error?
Any help would be much appreciated!
thanks
